content.rendered:
This is
Altshare

No matter what stage your startup’s at, Altshare gets equity done,
so founders get back to taking care of business.

Our Vision

When it comes to equity, you can't just wing it

Nail the product. Get new investors. Make key hires. Grow like crazy. As a founder, these are your only goals.
Whatever helps you get there – great. Everything else just gets in the way. Same goes for managing equity.

The new way
founders
do equity

That’s why we built Altshare – the only equity management platform made just for entrepreneurs.

Altshare is based on decades of experience as a leading Israeli provider of trustee, stock administration, compensation plans and administration services and trusted by 2,000 companies and organizations, over 100 VC firms, and 60k+ beneficiaries worldwide. So equity gets done – and you get back to taking care of business.

Contact Us
founders love us

Our Founding
Team

Ronen Solomon
Founder & CEO
Chen Altshuler
Chairwoman of the Board
Ran Shaham
Board Director
Aviya Telias
VP Human Resources
Leeyah Barak-Abadi
Chief legal & Pro. Affairs Officer
Shani Shivatski
VP R&D
Eyal Froind
Chief Sales Officer
Elyor Zitalni
Chief Valuations Officer

Join the
Altshare Team

See All Open Positions

Ask Us Anything

Contact Us
